achievements.title: Island-Wide Victory at Badulla – All-Island Dhamma School Championship
achievements.story: Ranked No.1 Dhamma School in the All-Island Competition held in Badulla District. Months of weekend practices, teamwork, and discipline led to this proud victory — a symbol of unity, wisdom, and excellence across our entire school community.

achievements.title: All-Island First Place – Thidisa Rasindi (Pali Gatha Gayana)
achievements.story: In the same All-Island competition at Badulla, Thidisa Rasindi brought individual honor by securing first place in the 'Awasana' category under Pali Gatha Gayana — showcasing exceptional pronunciation, emotion, and discipline.

achievements.title: A Record-Breaking Performance – 39 Wins out of 41
achievements.story: In the 2017 zonal-level Dhamma school competitions, our institute made history by achieving victories in 39 out of 41 competition categories — an all-time record that highlighted the depth of talent across every forum and age group.
